DeleteYourAccountText: If you delete your account, it will be no longer available. Furthermore, all data associated with you will be permanently deleted. Are you sure you want to leave us? :(

FeedbackGuide: In order to write a good feedback message you should consider each candidate separately. Everyone is different. But you can focus on these 4 steps: provide an answer regarding your decision, point out candidate's strengths, explain why they fit/don't fit your company and try to guide them how to improve the missing skills.
YouHaventCreatedOffer: You have not created any offer yet
